metadata.title: CVE-2024-26760 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: target: pscsi: Fix bio_put() for error caseAs of commit 066ff571011d ("block: turn bio_kmalloc into a simple kmallocwrapper"), a bio allocated by bio_kmalloc() must be freed by bio_uninit()and kfree(). That is not done properly for the error case, hitting WARN andNULL pointer dereference in bio_free().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
